intro: Get ready for a spooky and sweet Halloween with 111 backgrounds full of pumpkins, magic, and terrifying fun!
description:
Trick or treat visuals!

Enjoy 111 Halloween-themed backgrounds filled with color, glittering pumpkins, mysterious forests, and haunted houses in an adorable animated style.
Accompanied by spooky yet charming ambient music, each scene immerses you in the magic of Halloween, perfect for inspiration, relaxation, or simply enjoying the festive atmosphere.

Features:

- 111 high-quality Halloween backgrounds
- Original ambient music
- Adorable cinematic visual style
- Perfect for all ages

Get swept away by the sweetness and mystery of Spooky Sweets Screen Backgrounds!
